newsitem.title: USA: SEC suspends trade in Systems.
newsitem.headline: SEC suspends trade in Systems.

text.p: The Securities and Exchange Commission said Monday it suspended trading in Systems of Excellence Inc because of questions raised on the accuracy of its information.

SEC said it ordered the suspension because of the reported financial condition, existence and value of services rendered to the company in exchange for stock issued by Systems of Excellence and questions on whether the stock was issued to consultants without registration.
SEC also questioned the reasons for changes in the company's independent accountants and sales of its video teleconferencing products.
The suspension runs from October 7 through October 21, the SEC said.
The company is located in Coral Gables, Florida and McLean, Va.
